author: rudolf6
content:
Sharing brief presentation <@774033563732541451> put together for today's Verkle Implementers Call, on some of the less obvious potential overlap/interactions between Verkle + EOF. Wanted to share here since it was touched on last ACDE 

Goal isn't to steer the conversation a specific way, but just to help organize the relevant points and make sure we aren't missing anything ğŸ™ 

Will start a thread here for any discussion/feedback 

https://hackmd.io/@jsign/slides-eof-verkle#/
